privacy.warn:

- Out of membership: ${link}

iland.revolutionaryCollaboration:
2024, the world's eagerly anticipated next iconic girl group emerges through the revolutionary collaboration.

${Two worlds coexist within I-LAND}
${'I-LAND'}, a dream space where everything is provided under best conditions,
${'GROUND'}, a proving ground for trainees striving to enter I-LAND.
Debut opportunities are exclusively awarded to 'I-LAND' survivors.

I-LAND, the uncharted place
now unfolds
a new adventure to find I(N/a)!

${FIND YOUR I}
iland.cuteBabyFox: A cute baby fox born in Metaball
iland.aboutNasuri:
Metaball is an object with infinite possibilities, capable of become anything.
Inside it contains a variety of unpredictable energies.

Then one day,
from the vast energy of Metaball, an incomplete baby fox named NaSURI is born.
NaSURI makes a special contract with an unknown entity to become a complete fox.

${"Help girls who join I-LAND to find 'me'}
${and become a groundbreaking girl group."}

With about 100 days left, 
NASURI helps girls with various potential to grow...
Will it succeed in gathering the energy of Metaball and become a full-fledged fox?
iland.compoundWord: A compound word combining 'I' from IDOL and 'MATE' meaning friends
iland.findFavoriteIdol:
It refers to global fans who will find their favorite idol(I) 
and become friends(MATE) with them, sharing the destiny.
iland.aboutSongkang:
The central figure leading the world of I-LAND,
conveying stories unfolding within I-LAND and connecting the global fans to the applicants.
iland.aboutTeddy:
Billboard's 'The Most Outstanding Producer of the 21st Century,'
utilizing expertise from creating world-class idols BIGBANG, 2NE1, and BLACKPINK,
will manage the production of I-LAND applicants to develop them into global stars.
iland.aboutTeayang:
The main vocal and main dancer of 'BIGBANG'!
He assists the applicants by offering technical advices as a legendary all-around artist with global stage experience,
and providing practical advices based on his long-term experience.
iland.about24:
As the exclusive producer of THE BLACK LABEL, renowned for its work with BIGBANG, BLACKPINK, and JEON SOMI,
he understands the musical abilities of I-LAND 2 applicants better than anyone else.
iland.profile24:
Composed 'Ddu-Du Ddu-Du,' 'Kill This Love,' 'How You Like That,' 'Lovesick Girls,' 'Pink Venom,' Shut Down' by BLACKPINK 
'SOLO' by JENNIE 
'DUMB DUMB,' 'XOXO' by JEON SOMI 
'LAST DANCE,' 'Still Life' by BIGBANG and more.
iland.aboutVVN:
THE BLACK LABEL's elite producer from UC Berkeley
She will produce for I-LAND 2 applicants, not only in music but also in various other aspects.
iland.profileVVN:
Composed 'Flower', 'All Eyes On Me' by JISOO 
'Ready For Love', 'Yeah Yeah Yeah' by BLACKPINK
'Still Life' by BIGBANG 
'Nightfall' by TAEYANG 
'Fxxked Up' by JEON SOMI and more.
iland.aboutMonika:
The Performance legend! An overwhelmingly charismatic choreographer,
develops applicants' self-producing abilities with a calm, objective gaze.
iland.profileMonika:
<Street Dance Girls Fighter> Master, <Street Woman Fighter 2> Fight Jersey
Awarded  Minister of Culture, Sports, and Tourism Commendation at the 14th Korean Popular Culture and Arts Awards in 2023
Currently a member of 'Proudman' and 'MOLIP' crews
iland.aboutLeejung:
Choreographer of global K-POP hits,
completes the star quality of the applicants with her ability to read global trends.
iland.profileLeejung:
Choreographed for 'The GIRLS' by BLACKPINK
'You&Me' by JENNIE
'LALISA', 'MONEY' by LISA
'XOXO', 'Dumb Dumb' by JEON SOMI
'Alcohol-Free', by TWICE
'WANNABE' by ITZY

intro.welcom:
Welcome! NaSURI's friend, I-MATE!
Welcome to the world of I-LAND💜

Join NaSURI
and go on an adventure to find your fave 'I'!
It's going to be so much fun, so get excited✨
intro.nasuriCheer:
NaSURI will cheer for your fave 'I' with you!
You'll be happy today, tomorrow, and beyond!

If you're ready to join NaSURI,
please press enter💜

iland.increaseNasuriHappy: ${Please use Metaballs} to increase NaSURI's happiness
iland.metaballIs:
'Metaball' serves as a key channel, connecting the uncharted space I-LAND with our world, while also representing an energy collection with infinite possibilities

I-MATE can collect hidden Metaballs within Mnet Plus to support applicants during their time in I-LAND.
iland.cheerByMetaball: I-MATE can support the applicants they cheer for by using their Metaballs!
iland.asManyMetaball: You can support the applicant with as many Metaballs as you have, without any limits.
iland.earn20MetaballWithEvent: Earn up to 20 Metaballs by participating two events
iland.noCooltime: You can view ads up to 25 times per day.
iland.canAdsRestrict: You must complete watching the ad to earn Metaballs.
iland.emptyVideoInFilter: No videos in this filter yet.
iland.enterMetaballCount:
Enter the number of Metaballs
to support %{applicantName}.
iland.metaballInsufficient: Your current Metaball balance is insufficient.
iland.supportWarn1: Each support will be awarded upon reaching 100% achievement. If the maximum number of recipients is exceeded, it will be awarded on a first-come, first-served basis, determined by the time of reaching the achievement point.
iland.supportWarn2: The number of Metaballs required to achieve support varies for each round, and the Metaballs received by the applicants are not carried over or accumulated for the next round.
iland.supportWarn3: The support progress for each applicant is updated once a day, and any additional Metaballs collected beyond the required amount for achievement won't be saved for future rounds.
iland.supportWarn4: There is a limit to the support achievement rate for each applicant, which may vary depending on the criteria for each round.
iland.supportWarn5: Applicants eliminated in the show will not receive support even if they met the support criteria.
iland.supportWarn6: If you participate in the support violating the policy or through improper means, this may result in the Metaballs used being confiscated or revoked.
iland.supportWarn7: Support details for each round may be subject to change due to internal circumstances.
iland.notSupported: This feature is not supported in the current version. Please update to the latest version.
iland.supportApplyAt:
The supported Metaballs
will be reflected daily at 12:00 A.M. (KST).

phase2.subtitle: 确定要删除账号吗？
phase2.bullet1: 将无法再使用此账号登录Mnet Plus。
phase2.bullet2: 即使删除账号,您之前所写的评论和帖子并不会被删除。
phase2.bullet3: 您无法使用此账户登录与Mnet Plus连接的服务。

phase1.subtitle: 请在删除前确认
phase1.body:
此账户为联合账户，除Mnet Plus社群之外，还可使用Mnet Plus服务，CJ ENM提供的服务及与Mnet Plus合作的外部服务。
 
 如果删除账户，包含账户信息和服务使用记录在内的所有信息都将被删除。
 
 注销后，您将无法继续使用账户登录，因此，除Mnet Plus服务之外，其他所有连接使用的服务也将无法使用。
phase1.footnote: 删除的账户信息和服务使用记录将无法恢复，因此，请谨慎选择。

connectedService.warning: 删除账户后，将无法继续使用下述服务且无法恢复数据。
connectedService.confirmList: 我已确认所有无法继续使用的的服务列表。
connectedService.confirmDelete: 无法恢复上述服务使用记录和个人信息数据。

kconers.title: Worldwide KCONers' Choice
kconers.subtitle: 请选出在KCON展现最标志性舞台的艺人！
kconers.desciption:
请收看2024年在各地区KCON进行的KCON现场投票TOP 10的表演视频,选出2024年一年间在KCON展现最标志性舞台的艺人。

将各地区KCON观众参与的现场投票和网络投票合算后最终决定获奖者。

notice2.title: 2. 获奖者选定标准
notice2.description1:
KCON现场投票70%+网络投票30%
（合计现场投票数和网络投票数决定最终获奖者）

notice3.title: 3.注意事项
notice3.description1: 最终合计时将排除以非正常方式累计的投票数。

2024年进行的KCON阵容中 通过现场观众的投票选出的TOP 10艺人

- KCON HONG KONG 2024 (Mar 30 - Mar 31)
- KCON JAPAN 2024 (May 10 - May 12)
- KCON LA 2024 (July 26 - 28)
- KCON GERMANY 2024 (Sep 28 - Sep 29)

desc.intro:
In Stage Fighter, public voting for stage assessments
are conducted in the form of seat booking.

Out of the 4 classes of seats VIP / R / S / A,
in which area would you watch the stage?

Select your preferred seat to vote.
desc.stageWillBe:
Stages will be evaluated based on your seating class
Book vote-tickets for the stage, now
desc.tapTheSeat: Tap the seating zone to book your seat.
desc.voteYourMVP: Pick the dancer who rocked the stage
desc.canVoteOneDancer: You can only vote for one dancer.

voteGuide.title: [Stage Voting Notice]
voteGuide.item1: In Stage Fighter, public voting for stage assessments is conducted in the form of seat booking.
voteGuide.item2: Out of the 4 classes of seats VIP / R / S / A, vote for your preferred seat of which you would watch the stage.

intro.content1:
In a lavish celebration of dukes and nobles,
a rebellion is ignited by the loyal servants in a quest to climb up the social class. As the nobles fight to preserve and the butlers to take, the class warfare escalates into a catastrophe.
intro.content2:
Children of the top 0.1% of elite families work tirelessly to enter a prestigious university in the pressure of
their parents’ high expectations. Yet, the children decide to run from the torturous competition and find their true selves.
intro.content3: In a survival game to obtain the ultimate power through dance, dancers are confused as they come to realize that they are partners intertwined by dance. To unite or to fight? What choices will the dancers make?
intro.content4:
While an imprisoned man is yearning for an escape
for his unexplained confinement, his revenge seeking captor continues to force oppression to destroy him to his deepest soul. What faith awaits him in his struggle for freedom?

Complete to watch ad!
